sentences.en: A baseball player who is not a speedy runner can compensate by powerful hitting.
sentences.cn: 跑步速度不快的棒球手可以凭有力的打击来弥补.

sentences.en: Because my left eye is so weak, my right eye has to work harder to compensate.
sentences.cn: 因为我左眼视力差，右眼就要辛苦点来弥补一下。

sentences.en: It might compensate in some way for his seeming neglect of her.
sentences.cn: 这样也许会稍许弥补一下他在表面上对她的忽视.

sentences.en: MPs say it is crucial that a system is found to compensate for inflation.
sentences.cn: 下议院的议员们说关键是要找到一种抵消通货膨胀影响的机制。

sentences.en: Nothing can compensate for the loss of a loved one.
sentences.cn: 失去心爱的人是无法补偿的。

sentences.en: Nothing can compensate for the loss of time.
sentences.cn: 虚度光阴是无法补偿的(光阴一去不复还).

sentences.en: People who sense that they are inferior have to compensate, and often over-compensate by way of outward achievement.
sentences.cn: 觉得自卑的人只有通过外在的成就来弥补自己的不足，但往往都做过了头。

sentences.en: She used her good looks to compensate for her lack of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 她智力欠佳权以美貌弥补.

sentences.en: She used her good looks to compensate her lack of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 她利用她漂亮的外表来弥补智力的不足.

sentences.en: She would then feel guilt for her anger and compensate by doing even more for the children.
sentences.cn: 之后她会因为自己发火而感到愧疚，会替孩子们做更多的事作为补偿。

sentences.en: The company agreed to keep up high levels of output in order to compensate for supplies lost.
sentences.cn: 这家公司同意保持高产量以弥补供货丢失带来的缺口。

sentences.en: The firm must compensate you for your traveling costs.
sentences.cn: 这家公司必须偿付给你差旅费.

sentences.en: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.cn: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

sentences.en: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.cn: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.en: The hospital staff were very apologetic but that couldn't really compensate.
sentences.cn: 医院的工作人员深表歉意，但这真的于事无补。

sentences.en: To compensate for his unpleasant experiences in hospital, the man drank a little more than was good for him.
sentences.cn: 为了补偿他住院期间的不愉快的经历, 这个人喝多了一点酒.

sentences.en: We compensate workers for injuries suffered at their work.
sentences.cn: 我们对工人在工作中受伤给予补偿.

sentences.en: You must compensate me for this loss.
sentences.cn: 你必须补偿我的这个损失.

words.tran_cn: 可补偿的；应予以补偿的

trans.tran_en: to replace or balance the effect of something bad
to replace or balance the effect of something bad
